description: News about Metropolitan Opera, including commentary and archival articles published in The New York Times.
title: Metropolitan Opera
title_page: Metropolitan Opera - The New York Times
maintext:
The Fact and Fiction Behind Shostakovich’s ‘Lady Macbeth’
The 1934 opera, revived this season at the Metropolitan Opera, stoked the ire of the Soviet state, or so the story goes. But archives tell a more interesting tale.
